Articles.Content:
I made a wallpaper pack with some screenshots I found

At the moment there are 13 wallpapers (1080p) and I will add more soon.

I uploaded the wallpapers to Google Drive, you can find them here:

KSP Wallpapers - Google Drive

Download all wallpapers from Dropbox (zipped):

KSP Wallpapers (zipped) - Dropbox

Further suggestions and criticism are requested.

Hope you enjoy, greetings from Germany

Thank you for the share, take this as constructive criticism, but they are just screenshots with a cartoon style filter. I like the effort put into the builds and they are nice but I would definitely like to see where you could go with these in the future. Keep up the good work friend.

I absolutely agree with Bulletrhli. The composition and subject are really good, but the (pastels?) filter really isn't doing the concept any favors. Keep going, though! I genuinely think you've got some impressive work in your future.

1.) The Google Drive App is currently unavailable.

2.) When I go to dropbox it says the link doesn't exist.

It'd be nice if you could post them here instead
